verses.verse: The elders4245, 3588 among <WG1722> you <WG5213> I exhort <WG3870>, who <WG3588> am a fellow-elder <WG4850>, and <WG2532> a witness <WG3144> of the sufferings <WG3804> of Christ <WG5547>, who am also <WG2532> a partaker <WG2844> of the glory <WG1391> that shall <WG3195> be revealed <WG601>:

Tend <WG4165> the flock <WG4168> of God <WG2316> which is among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, exercising the oversight <WG1983>, not <WG3361> of constraint <WG317>, but <WG235> willingly <WG1596>, according to the will of God <WG3366>; nor yet for filthy lucre <WG147>, but <WG235> of a ready mind <WG4290>;
neither <WG3366> as <WG5613> lording it over <WG2634> the charge <WG2819> allotted to you <WG235>, but making <WG1096> yourselves ensamples <WG5179> to the flock <WG4168>.
And when <WG2532> the chief Shepherd <WG750> shall be manifested <WG5319>, ye shall receive <WG2865> the crown <WG4735> of glory <WG1391> that fadeth not away <WG262>.

Likewise <WG3668>, ye <WG240> younger <WG3501>, be subject <WG5293> unto the elder <WG4245>. Yea <WG1161>, all <WG3956> of you gird yourselves with <WG1463> humility <WG5012>, to serve one another <WG5293>: for <WG3754> God <WG2316> resisteth <WG498> the proud <WG5244>, but <WG1161> giveth <WG1325> grace <WG5485> to the humble <WG5011>.
Humble yourselves <WG5013> therefore <WG3767> under <WG5259> the mighty <WG2900> hand <WG5495> of God <WG2316>, that <WG2443> he may exalt <WG5312> you <WG5209> in <WG1722> due time <WG2540>;
casting <WG1977> all <WG3956> your <WG5216> anxiety <WG3308> upon <WG1909> him <WG846>, because <WG3754> he <WG846> careth <WG3199> for <WG4012> you <WG5216>.

Be sober <WG3525>, be watchful <WG1127>: <WG3754> your <WG5216> adversary <WG476> the devil <WG1228>, as <WG5613> a roaring <WG5612> lion <WG3023>, walketh about <WG4043>, seeking <WG2212> whom <WG5101> he may devour <WG2666>,

whom <WG3739> withstand <WG436> stedfast <WG4731> in your faith <WG4102>, knowing that <WG1492> the same <WG846> sufferings <WG3804> are accomplished <WG2005> in your <WG5216> brethren <WG81> who are in <WG1722> the world <WG2889>.

And <WG1161> the God <WG2316> of all <WG3956> grace <WG5485>, who <WG3588> called <WG2564> you <WG2248> unto <WG1519> his <WG846> eternal <WG166> glory <WG1391> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, <WG2424> after that ye have suffered <WG3958> a little while <WG3641>, shall <WG2675> himself846, Romans9 perfect <WG2675>, establish <WG4741>, strengthen <WG4599> you <WG2311>.
To him <WG846> be the <WG1391> dominion <WG2904> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and <WG2532> ever <WG165>. Amen <WG281>.

By <WG1223> Silvanus <WG4610>, our faithful <WG4103> brother <WG80>, as <WG5613> I account <WG3049> him <WG1223>, I have written <WG1125> unto you <WG5213> briefly <WG3641>, exhorting <WG3870>, and <WG2532> testifying <WG1957> that this <WG3778> is <WG1511> the true <WG227> grace <WG5485> of God <WG2316>. Stand <WG2476> ye fast <WG3739> therein <WG1519>.
She that is in <WG1722> Babylon <WG897>, elect together with <WG4899> you <WG5209>, saluteth <WG782> you <WG5209>; and <WG2532> so doth Mark my <WG3450> son <WG5207>.
Salute <WG782> one another <WG240> with <WG1722> a kiss <WG5370> of love <WG26>. Peace <WG1515> be unto you <WG5213> all <WG3956> that <WG3588> are in1722, 2424 Christ <WG5547>.
